data.title: experience
data.meta_description: I design, implement, and evaluate learning programs for 21st century learning & workplace readiness for job seekers in employment centres as well as faculty in higher ed. Programs encompass: online...
data.text:
course, program + instructional design

​I currently teach & advise in higher education in the US and have been humbled to receive Favorite Professor Awards from undergraduates at SUNY Potsdam (3 years running!) + to be nominated for an Excellence in Teaching award at Johns Hopkins University by doctoral students the School of Education.

My teaching, training & development approach is collaborative and evidence-informed. ​Importantly, I depend on regular check-ins with learners to inform my teaching and to guide adaptations. I teach bachelors, masters, and doctoral courses in:

online teaching + learning in higher education

instructional design

the learning sciences

the improvement sciences

cognitive development

research methods

teacher professional development

​employability and job skills development

human resource management

organization development

principles of leadership

human capital development

​policy, ethics, and issues

curriculum + assessment

​materials + textbook design

​K-12 education reform​

​promotion, outreach
